name: Colorless Castle
description:
Made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 111: Colors² with the limitation you are your own enemy. You play as a one peaceful king who is trying to rid the world of Colors but to complete your goal you have to complete 20 puzzles.

Controls
  • Move: Arrows/WASD
  • Jump: Space/W/Up Arrow
  • Crouch: Shift/S/Down arrow/
  • Restart: R
Credit
  • Programmer: HmanHere
  • Designer: PepperBoi
  • Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
